item.description:

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

item.title: 中国股市因刺激政策狂飙而创下七个月来最大涨幅
item.description: 中国央行为遏制不断恶化的经济前景和市场情绪，采取了一系列最新政策措施，推动中国股市周二攀升。【原文：China’s stocks climbed Tuesday, fueled by the central bank’s latest blitz of policy measures designed to stem the worsening economic outlook and market mood.】

item.title: 医疗保健股难逃大选洗礼
item.description:
该行业更像是一个选股市场，公司的前景可能因政治结果而大不相同。【原文：

The sector is more of a stock-picker’s market, and prospects for companies can vary greatly on political outcomes.

】

item.title: 法国资产面临政治动荡再起带来新损失的风险
item.description: 由于投资者对新政府能否在未来几个月内渡过难关失去信心，他们正在抛弃法国的资产。【原文：Investors are spurning French assets as they lose confidence in the ability of a new government to survive the coming months.】

item.title: 丹格特的 "怪物 "炼油厂为汽油补贴之争火上浇油
item.description: 本月早些时候，尼日利亚亿万富翁阿里科-丹格特（Aliko Dangote）的大型炼油厂开始生产汽油，这终于促使这个非洲最大的原油生产国朝着结束燃料补贴的方向迈进。【原文：The start of gasoline production at Nigerian billionaire Aliko Dangote’s mega oil refinery earlier this month finally spurred Africa’s top crude producer to move toward ending fuel subsidy that costs the country billions of dollars annually and crippled it economically.】

item.title: 马斯克在颁奖晚会上称意大利的梅洛尼为 "真实、诚实 "的人
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在纽约的一个颁奖典礼上发表简短讲话，对意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）大加赞赏，这是一位试图让唐纳德-特朗普当选的亿万富翁与一位与其七国集团盟友不和的欧洲领导人之间关系融洽的最新迹象。【原文：Elon Musk offered effusive praise for Italian Premier Giorgia Meloni in brief remarks at an awards ceremony in New York, the latest sign of coziness between a billionaire who’s trying to get Donald Trump elected and a European leader at odds with her Group of Seven allies.】

item.title: 中国十年来首次增加大型银行资本
item.description: 中国正计划对其最大的商业贷款机构进行十多年来的首次资本结构调整，以加强这个正与创纪录的低利润率、利润下滑和坏账增加作斗争的行业。【原文：China is planning to recapitalize its biggest commercial lenders for the first time in more than a decade, seeking to strengthen the industry battling with record low margins, sinking profits and rising bad debt.】

item.title: 日本大型 IPO 将考验小型上市的主导地位
item.description: 未来几个月，日本将迎来更大规模的首次股票发行，这将为过去十年中首次股票发行融资额大多低于 1 亿美元的市场注入活力。【原文：Japan is poised to welcome larger share-sale debuts in the coming months, invigorating a market that has mostly seen debuts raising less than $100 million in the past decade.】

item.title: 中国推出刺激政策提振经济的五大要点
item.description: 在央行行长与证券和金融监管机构举行的罕见发布会上，中国公布了更多提振徘徊不前的经济的措施。以下是这场长达约 90 分钟的会议的主要内容：【原文：China unveiled more measures to boost its stuttering economy in a rare briefing by the head of the central bank, along with the securities and financial regulators. Here are the key takeaways from the roughly 90-minute-long event:】

item.title: 中国矿业巨头与津巴布韦合作开采锂矿
item.description: 中国矿商浙江华友钴业股份有限公司和青山控股集团有限公司不畏锂价低迷，与津巴布韦一家国营公司合作开发电池金属矿藏。【原文：Chinese miners Zhejiang Huayou Cobalt Co. and Tsingshan Holding Group Co. are defying low lithium prices to develop a deposit of the battery metal with a Zimbabwean state company.】

item.title: 吉利计划投资 1.7 亿美元在越南生产汽车
item.description: 吉利汽车计划在越南组装汽车，这是吉利为扩大在东南亚国家的生产而作出的一系列承诺的一部分，价值近 1.7 亿美元。【原文：Geely Auto is planning to assemble vehicles in Vietnam as part of a series of commitments worth nearly $170 million to expand production in the Southeast Asian country.】

item.title: 印度投资者担心估值过高，向东寻求更好的投资回报
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国天齐将继续争取在 SQM 锂交易中的角色
item.description: 天齐锂业公司（Tianqi Lithium Corp.）誓言要继续争取在一项计划中的交易中的发言权，以分享世界上最大的锂业务之一的所有权，该公司认为这一交易对中国未来在智利的投资至关重要。【原文：Tianqi Lithium Corp. vowed to continue its battle for a say in a planned deal to share ownership of one of the world’s biggest lithium operations, a case the company sees as crucial for future Chinese investment in Chile.】

item.title: 分析师称中国措施显示出支持股市的紧迫性
item.description: 交易员和策略师表示，中国央行发布的一系列令人震惊的公告将在短期内提振股票和债券，但他们对这一影响将持续多久意见不一。【原文：Traders and strategists said a series of shock announcements from China’s central bank would give a short-term boost to stocks and bonds, but they were split on how long the impact would last.】

item.title: 远洋债权人对英国重组策略表示担忧
item.description: 远洋集团控股公司的一些债权人对这家中国建筑商在英国法院寻求重组策略表示担忧，他们试图避免可能对他们不公平的裁决。【原文：Some creditors of Sino-Ocean Group Holding expressed concerns about the Chinese builder’s pursuit of a restructuring tactic in UK courts, seeking to avoid a potential ruling that they fear would be unfair to them.】

item.title: 香港最大开发商降息后以折扣价出售房屋
item.description: 香港最大的房地产开发商新鸿基地产有限公司（Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd.）正在以八折的优惠推销一个新项目，以吸引近期利率下调后的买家。【原文：Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd., Hong Kong’s biggest property developer, is marketing a new project at a 20% discount to lure buyers after a recent interest-rate reduction.】

item.title: 中国允许基金和经纪人使用中国人民银行资金购买股票
item.description: 中国将允许基金和经纪商利用央行的资金购买股票，这是旨在提振经济和提升投资者情绪的一揽子广泛措施的一部分。【原文：China will allow funds and brokers to tap the central bank’s funding to buy stocks, as part of a broad package of measures designed to boost the economy and lift investor sentiment.】

item.title: 中国政府采取一系列措施援助经济，铁矿石飙升
item.description: 在中国宣布一系列促进经济增长的措施后，铁矿石飙升，提振了世界最大进口国的需求前景。【原文：Iron ore spiked after China announced a series of measures to boost growth, buoying the outlook for demand in the world’s largest importer.】

item.title: 随着交易的临近，Vista、Blackstone 使 Smartsheet 债务条款更加优惠
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Vista Equity Partners 和 Blackstone Inc. 已向支持其收购 Smartsheet Inc.【原文：Vista Equity Partners and Blackstone Inc. have made several concessions to a group of private lenders backing their proposed acquisition of Smartsheet Inc. as they inch closer to a deal with the software maker, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 中国 10 年期债券收益率有史以来首次降至 2
item.description: 随着中国央行宣布一揽子货币政策宽松措施以支持经济增长，中国基准债券收益率有史以来首次跌至 2%。【原文：China’s benchmark bond yield fell to 2% for the first time on record, as the central bank announced a package of monetary policy easing measures to support growth.】

item.title: 日元面临不利因素，削弱美联储大幅减息的优势
item.description: 日元正面临着诸多不利因素，这些因素似乎超过了美联储降息带来的任何好处。【原文：The yen is facing a multitude of negatives that seem to be outweighing any advantage it’s gained from the bumper Federal Reserve interest-rate cut.】

item.title: X 上的 OpenAI 新闻账户遭入侵，发送有关加密货币的帖子
item.description: OpenAI称，其在X上的一个账户于周一遭到入侵，当时一个未经授权的人发出帖子，招揽用户点击进入一个加密代币，谎称与人工智能初创公司有关。【原文：OpenAI said one of its accounts on X was compromised on Monday, when an unauthorized individual sent out posts soliciting users to click through to a crypto token falsely claiming to be related to the artificial intelligence startup.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）希望在可再生能源组合中开展酒精变喷气机项目
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司计划投资一项工艺，利用玉米或甘蔗乙醇将酒精转化为可持续航空燃料。【原文：Petrobras plans to invest in a process to convert alcohol into sustainable aviation fuel using corn or sugarcane ethanol.】

item.title: 以色列袭击黎巴嫩引发紧张情绪，石油走高
item.description: 以色列对黎巴嫩发动空袭，造成近 500 人死亡，引发了人们对中东爆发全面战争的担忧，此后石油价格走高。【原文：Oil edged higher after Israel launched airstrikes on Lebanon that killed nearly 500 people and raised fears of a full-blown war in the Middle East.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好美股继续攀升。波音公司提高了工资报价。交易员们正密切关注澳大利亚央行的动向。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. US stocks just keep on climbing. Boeing increases its wage offer. And traders are keeping a close eye on the RBA. Here’s what’s moving markets. —Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 众议院批准芯片许可证豁免，并将法案送交拜登
item.description: 美国众议院批准了一项立法，规定某些半导体制造项目免于联邦许可要求，以消除人们对环境审查和诉讼会延误国内芯片工厂建设的担忧。【原文：The US House approved legislation that would exempt some semiconductor manufacturing projects from federal permitting requirements, addressing concerns that environmental reviews and lawsuits will delay construction of domestic chip factories.】

item.title: 伦敦高管呼吁改革治理和养老金制度以吸引更多 IPO
item.description: 一项调查发现，英国政府应优先简化公司治理要求，鼓励养老基金投资本地股票，以增强英国资本市场的吸引力。【原文：The British government should prioritize streamlining corporate governance requirements and encouraging pension funds to invest in local stocks to boost the appeal of the UK’s capital markets, a survey finds.】

item.title: 中国选股者转向 ETF 损失 3120 亿美元资产
item.description: 中国股市的无情暴跌已迫使明星基金经理失业，投资者损失惨重，主动型基金资产也从高峰期缩水 40%。然而，市场的一角却在蓬勃发展。【原文：A relentless slump in Chinese equities has pushed star money managers out of jobs, left investors saddled with losses and driven a 40% drawdown in active fund assets from their peak. Yet one corner of the market has been booming.】

item.title: 美国再次降息，亚洲股市有望上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在几位美联储政策制定者暗示将进一步放宽政策，以及对中国准备宣布刺激措施的乐观情绪激增之后，亚洲股市将追随华尔街同行走高。【原文：Asian equities are set to follow Wall Street peers higher after several Federal Reserve policymakers hinted at further easing and as optimism surged that China was poised to announce stimulus measures.】

item.title: 备忘录称前推特员工赢得马斯克裁员薪酬之战
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社获得的一份备忘录，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在与一名前推特（Twitter）员工的未付遣散费法律诉讼中败诉，这名员工在 2022 年埃隆-马斯克接管该社交媒体平台时被解雇。【原文：Elon Musk lost a legal fight over unpaid severance to a former Twitter employee who was laid off when he took over the social media platform in 2022, according to a memo obtained by Bloomberg News.】
